objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><radialGradient id='backgroundGradient' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='70%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#9683B6'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#7A6A9E'/></radialGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#backgroundGradient)'/><g transform='translate(540,540)'><circle r='350' fill='#8675AB' filter='drop-shadow(0px 8px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25))'/><circle r='250' fill='#7A6A9E' filter='drop-shadow(0px 6px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2))'/><circle r='150' fill='#6A5C8E' filter='drop-shadow(0px 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15))'/></g><g transform='translate(540,540)' opacity='0.1'><path d='M-350,0 A350,350 0 0,1 350,0' stroke='white' stroke-width='2' fill='none' transform='rotate(-20)'/><path d='M-250,0 A250,250 0 0,1 250,0' stroke='white' stroke-width='2' fill='none' transform='rotate(-20)'/><path d='M-150,0 A150,150 0 0,1 150,0' stroke='white' stroke-width='2' fill='none' transform='rotate(-20)'/></g><g transform='translate(1050,30)'><circle r='160' fill='#9683B6' filter='drop-shadow(0px 6px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25))'/><circle r='110' fill='#8675AB' filter='drop-shadow(0px 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2))'/><circle r='60' fill='#7A6A9E' filter='drop-shadow(0px 3px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15))'/></g><g transform='translate(30,1050)'><circle r='160' fill='#9683B6' filter='drop-shadow(0px 6px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25))'/><circle r='110' fill='#8675AB' filter='drop-shadow(0px 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2))'/><circle r='60' fill='#7A6A9E' filter='drop-shadow(0px 3px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15))'/></g><g transform='translate(20,20)'><circle r='100' fill='#9683B6' filter='drop-shadow(0px 6px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25))'/><circle r='70' fill='#8675AB' filter='drop-shadow(0px 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2))'/><circle r='40' fill='#7A6A9E' filter='drop-shadow(0px 3px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15))'/></g></svg>

objects.text: Noise Reduction Technology • Hi-Res Audio • Deep Bass • Comfort Fit

product_details.description: Noise Reduction Technology: High Definition Stereo Headphones, noise reduction technology designed to reduce surrounding noise so that you can enjoy what you want to hear. Lose yourself in music even in the lowest volume levels! 40mm sound driver for true richness in sound and deep bass. EASY CONNECTIVITY: Gabba Goods Headphones are compatible with all Bluetooth or 3.5mm plug cable enabled devices such as , iPhones, Smart android phones, Tablet, Laptop, iPads, MP3/4 Player, Computers, MacBook and other Bluetooth devices. Just slide the on/off button and the headphones will be in ready to pair mode. It is built to provide a quick and stable Bluetooth connection and to enable hands-free communication through our special noise reduction technology Super Comfortable design: The Cushioned Ear Muffs are made of artificial leather so that you can wear them for extended time with comfort. The Headset is foldable for easy storage and travel. Great for use by Unisex Kids, Teens and Adults. Built-in microphone: For clear hands-free calling. Enjoy Speaking and Talking Handsfree A highly sensitive microphone that is perfect for capturing clear audio, Micro SD card support: And volume and pause/play functions , allows you to conveniently Listen to Your Favorite Music Audio books, and Podcasts. Brand - Gabba Goods ** Color - Lavender ** Ear Placement - Over Ear ** Form Factor - Over Ear ** Impedance - 26 Ohm **

banner_details:
A sleek product promotion banner with a tech-inspired, modern aesthetic designed for a wireless headphone advertisement. The background features a seamless radial gradient composed of layered concentric circles in soft purple tones, enhanced with subtle drop shadows to add dimensional depth. At the center, a realistic product image is featured prominently, ensuring high visual impact. The bold heading (id: "heading") and clean subheading (id: "subheading") sit at the top, establishing hierarchy. Key product features (id: "description") are listed below the product, followed by a prominently styled price (id: "price"). A clear call-to-action (id: "cta") is placed within a contrasting white button.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Lavender (#7A6A9E)
- Soft Lilac (#D4CDE6)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Shadow Plum (#5B4E7E)
- Muted Violet (#8675AB)
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek pair of over-ear headphones in various shades of purple, presenting a soft yet sophisticated visual appeal. The color palette includes a dominant lavender purple (#B497D6) with richer violet shadows (#785D9C) and a pastel lilac accent (#D8C5ED). These hues are smoothly blended, with a glossy finish on the ear cups that catches light, highlighting the curves and textures. The inner mesh reflects a deeper plum tone (#5D3A71), adding visual depth. For an advertisement banner, using gradients that transition from lilac to violet with white accents (#FFFFFF) will maintain the product’s elegant, tech-savvy vibe.
